errors.permissionDeniedDescription: Detected "permission_denied" error when accessing Realtime Database data.
errors.changeRules: Change rules to allow data reading (for testing you can set public access):
errors.productionWarning: In production environment, more strict security rules are recommended.
errors.noSensorData: No sensor data in Firebase database. Make sure that:
errors.checkRealtimeDb: You have configured Firebase Realtime Database
errors.checkDataStructure: Data is saved in sensors/{device_id} structure
errors.checkHistoryStructure: Historical data is saved in history/{device_id}
